mapper.select: SELECT R.id, H.address, H.name as houseName, M.name as guestName, date_format(R.start_register_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as startDate, date_format(R.end_register_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as endDate, H.price_per_person, H.max_people, R.progress, date_format(R.updated_at,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as updatedAt, S.name as hostName, S.phone as hostPhone, R.member_id as memberId, -- 총 결제 금액 계산 (DATEDIFF(R.end_register_date, R.start_register_date) * H.price_per_person) as totalPrice FROM reservation R JOIN house H ON R.house_id = H.id JOIN member M ON R.member_id = M.id JOIN member S ON H.member_id = S.id WHERE R.id = #{reservationId}
mapper.update: UPDATE reservation SET start_register_date = #{startRegisterDate}, end_register_date = #{endRegisterDate}, WHERE id = #{reservationId} AND progress = 'IN_PROGRESS'
